SELECT sys_user.user_id,sys_user.useraccount,sys_user.username, ren_record.id_no,ren_record.birthday,ren_record.entry_time,ren_record.sex, ren_record.job_type,ren_record.house_type,ren_record.education,ren_record.title_lever,ren_record.title_pro, ren_record.education_type,ren_record.pro_ratio,ren_record.duty_id,ren_record.education_time, ren_record.email,ren_record.native_province,ren_record.native_city, ren_record.mobile,ren_record.trial_period,ren_record.marital_status, ren_record.head_img,ren_record_temp.is_audit,ren_record_temp.audit_msg FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN ren_record on ren_record.user_id = sys_user.user_id LEFT JOIN ren_record_temp on ren_record_temp.user_id = sys_user.user_id

SELECT sys_user.user_id,sys_user.useraccount,sys_user.username, ren_record.id_no,ren_record.birthday,ren_record.entry_time,ren_record.sex, ren_record.job_type,ren_record.house_type,ren_record.education,ren_record.title_lever,ren_record.title_pro, ren_record.education_type,ren_record.pro_ratio,ren_record.duty_id,ren_record.education_time, proEd.score_name as proName,typeEd.score_name as edTypeName,ed.score_name as edName,duty.duty as dutyName, ren_record.email,ren_record.native_province,ren_record.native_city,title.job_title as titleName, ren_record.mobile,ren_record.trial_period,ren_record.marital_status, ren_record.head_img,ren_record_temp.is_audit,ren_record_temp.audit_msg FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN ren_record on ren_record.user_id = sys_user.user_id LEFT JOIN ren_record_temp on ren_record_temp.user_id = sys_user.user_id LEFT JOIN set_score_ed typeEd on (typeEd.id = ren_record.education_type and typeEd.cateId = 1) LEFT JOIN set_score_ed proEd on (proEd.id = ren_record.pro_ratio and proEd.cateId = 2) LEFT JOIN set_score_ed ed on (ed.id = ren_record.education and ed.cateId = 3) LEFT JOIN set_score_duty duty on duty.id = ren_record.duty_id LEFT JOIN set_score_title title on title.id = ren_record.title_lever where sys_user.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sys_user.user_id,sys_user.useraccount,sys_user.username, branch.branch_id,branch.order_num,branch.parent_id, ren_record.id_no,ren_record.birthday,ren_record.entry_time,ren_record.sex, ren_record.job_type,ren_record.house_type,ren_record.trial_period, ren_record.education,ed1.score_name as edName,ed1.score as edScore, ren_record.education_type,ed2.score_name as edTypeName, ed2.score as edTypescore, ren_record.pro_ratio,ed3.score_name as proName,ed3.score as edProscore, ren_record.title_lever,t1.job_title as titleName,t1.score as titleScore, ren_record.title_pro,t2.job_title as titleProname,t2.score as titleProscore, ren_record.duty_id,set_score_duty.duty as dutyName,set_score_duty.score as dutyScore, set_score_kbi_duty.standard_score as dutyStandScore, set_score_kbi_duty.assessno_score as dutyAssessScore, set_score_kbi_duty.trial_score as dutyTrialScore, set_score_kbi_title.standard_score as titleStandScore, set_score_kbi_title.assessno_score as titleAssessScore, set_score_kbi_title.trial_score as titleTrialScore, audit.kbi_audit_score, ren_record.education_time FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN ren_record on ren_record.user_id = sys_user.user_id LEFT JOIN ren_record_temp on ren_record_temp.user_id = sys_user.user_id LEFT JOIN set_score_ed ed1 on ed1.id = ren_record.education LEFT JOIN set_score_ed ed2 on ed2.id = ren_record.education_type LEFT JOIN set_score_ed ed3 on ed3.id = ren_record.pro_ratio LEFT JOIN set_score_title t1 on t1.id = ren_record.title_lever LEFT JOIN set_score_title t2 on t2.id = ren_record.title_pro LEFT JOIN set_score_duty on set_score_duty.id = ren_record.duty_id LEFT JOIN set_score_kbi_duty on set_score_kbi_duty.duty_id = ren_record.duty_id LEFT JOIN set_score_kbi_title on set_score_kbi_title.title_id = ren_record.title_lever LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from ren_kbi_audit where ren_kbi_audit.year = '${year}' and ren_kbi_audit.updown = '${updown}') audit on audit.user_id = sys_user.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT sys_branch_user.branch_id,sys_branch_user.user_id, sys_branch.branch_name,sys_branch.order_num,sys_branch.parent_id from sys_branch_user LEFT JOIN sys_branch on sys_branch.id = sys_branch_user.branch_id GROUP BY sys_branch_user.user_id ORDER BY sys_branch.parent_id,order_num) branch on branch.user_id = sys_user.user_id where sys_user.status = 1 and sys_user.useraccount != 'admin' and sys_user.useraccount != 'jiexin' ORDER BY branch.parent_id,branch.order_num,sys_user.user_id
